caption.p: Surface glycoprotein–ACE2–lisinopril/enalaprilat/captopril model. (A) Formula of lisinopril (ligand code LPR), enalaprilat (EAL), and captopril (X8Z). (B) Overall structure of the model. (C) Close view of the lisinopril/enalaprilat/captopril binding site. Hydrogen bonds are shown in yellow lines. Lisinopril, enalaprilat, and captopril were superposed, and the carbon atoms were colored light blue, gray, and magenta, respectively.
